description: Impose ensemble mean monthly mean of 3D stratospheric ozone from the DAMIP histAll simulations.
name: histAll stratospheric Ozone
rationale: Input for models with interactive chemistry that has been turned-off for the purposes of the DAMIP histSOZ simulations.
longName: DAMIP histAll ensemble mean monthly mean stratospheric ozone concentrations
keywords: DAMIP histALL, ozone, concentration, O3, stratosphere
